page.title: 08Village Newsletter
page.content:
Each month a 3/4 page newsletter is distributed to every dwelling in the Parish of Marden. It contains news, views and listings of events which have occurred or recurred in the last month and an almanac of forth coming dates and venues.
Regular articles appear from the village organisations and from individuals. Often, controversial matters are discussed and a cross section of opinion is represented. The Religious groups submit items and the Vicar's jottings appear each month.
The letter is community produced with a few central gathering places for the material to be included in future editions. It is printed on the School Roneo ink duplicating machine and then delivered by volunteers.
